Req: FranceVFR St. Martin & St. Barth

Wonderful, I love installers!
And, of course, I love Budapest. Never been there, though, but I love anything that has to do with Hungary, the home land of Franz Liszt...

the update installer searches for the following directory:

FS2004\Aerosoft\Budapest 2007\Budapest_City
FS2004\Aerosoft\Budapest 2007\Budapest_LHBP

so make sure you got those and this should work

Hey, sorry for that, I know what the problem is.

In the Aerosoft folder is there a 'Budapest 2007' folder.. Re-name that folder to 'Budapest'. Now it should work, oh and btw, xaver_Cox, now that you changed the Budapest 2007 folder, please let the 'Budapest_LHBP' folder has it name like that, so just re-name the folder back again to 'Budapest_LHBP' :-)

Sorry for that guys.

THX

yo7: Very little likelihood of getting SimCharts for FSX as it is now a web-based subscription app. Read the information carefully. Purchase of the SimCharts package gives you access for a year so you'll need to have someone's subscription codes to get it to work. Just FYI.
